title: Give me a reading list of 20 articles up to 2021 about the use of graph neural networks (gnn) in the context of natural language processing (nlp) more specifically about how to construct graphs from text and a review about using graph neural networks (gnn) for downstream tasks
<|assistant|>

Here's a reading list of 20 articles up to 2021 about the use of graph neural networks (GNNs) in the context of natural language processing (NLP), focusing on how to construct graphs from text and a review about using GNNs for downstream tasks
Graph Neural Networks for Natural Language Processing
This article provides an overview of GNNs and their applications in NLP
Graph-based Representation Learning for NLP
This paper introduces graph-based representation learning for NLP tasks and discusses the challenges and opportunities in this area
Graph Convolutional Networks for NLP
This paper introduces graph convolutional networks (GCNs) for NLP tasks and demonstrates their effectiveness in various tasks
Graph Attention Networks for NLP
This paper introduces graph attention networks (GATs) for NLP tasks and demonstrates their effectiveness in various tasks
